# WhatsApp Chat to PDF Converter - Project Setup Instructions

## Project Overview
Full-stack MVP web application that converts WhatsApp chat exports (.txt files) into clean, court-ready PDFs with Google SSO authentication and subscription-based access.

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- Backend: Cloudflare Workers
- Database: Cloudflare D1
- Authentication: Google SSO
- PDF Generation: pdf-lib
- Language: JavaScript/TypeScript

## Project Structure
- `/frontend` - Next.js application
- `/worker` - Cloudflare Worker backend
- `/database` - D1 schema and migrations
